General.Name: Cosmax Nbt Inc
General.Description: Cosmax Nbt, Inc. operates as a health functional food company in South Korea. The company offers tablets, such as un-coated, film-coated, chewable, and multi-layers; capsules; powder; and liquid drops, as well as supplements. It also exports its health functional foods to 31 countries. Cosmax Nbt, Inc. was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.

1.Name: Jay  Ann
1.Title: Sr. Managing Director of Sales & Marketing
